name: Christopher Buecheler
bio: Christopher Buecheler is the founder of CloseBrace.com, a tutorial and resource site for JavaScript developers. When not coding, he enjoys playing video games, crafting cocktails, and playing the guitar. You can also find his fiction work wherever eBooks are sold. He lives in Providence, Rhode Island, with his wife Charlotte and their two cats, Carbomb and Baron Salvatore H. Lynx II.
